title: Best moussaka
ingredients: ['4 aubergines, cut lengthways into 1cm thick slices', 'salt', '950ml milk', '110g butter', '6 tablespoons plain flour', 'salt to taste', '3 egg yolks, beaten', '7 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, grated', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '500g lean minced beef', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', 'salt and pepper to taste', '400g passata', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 egg white, lightly beaten', '120g freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
